author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Adding yoghurt and coconut to this dish gives it both a depth of flavour and also a rich, creamy texture.
name: Chicken Pilaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil and butter in a heavy-based saucepan over a medium heat. Add the onion and cook for 2 minutes. Add the chicken chunks and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the spices to the pan and cook for 1 minute. Add the rice and stir for a further minute to coat in the spices.
Add the stock and sultanas to the pan, season, and bring to the boil. Cover, reduce the heat, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir the coriander and yoghurt into the rice. Divide between 4 warmed plates and sprinkle with the coconut, to serve.
